attributes.action: This Spring put the clocks forward 2 hours
attributes.background: With the coming Summer the benefits of longer evenings will be a huge boost to the hospitality industry, sporting activities and socialising after the months of restrictions

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to change how British Summer Time works, but it's not clear if you want this to be a permanent change to the UK's time zone, a one-off that reverts in the autumn, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
